amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes in the bill including the area of informal rulemaking, clarifying what materials need to be printed, the consideration of preliminary regulatory impact analyses, and an exemption for the IRS from impact analysis requirements. \ As amended by the Traficant amendment (A005), language was added that provides an exemption to any regulation proposed or issued in connection with ensuring the collection of taxes from a subsidiary of a foreign company doing business in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment making technical and conforming changes in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gekas amendment (A006) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
